column6: I converse a lot which has caused appointments to run over time. Feel free to add a note with conversation levels (0-3).
column10: Currently not accepting new clients or children's haircuts.
column11: Barber apprentice since 2020. Habla espanol. IG: Monzta_cutz94

column4: Low Taper Fade, also known as 'The Llama' or the Teenager Cut, is a detailed style that demands skill and precision. Please bring reference pictures and clearly communicate desired length.
For styles of skin or bald fades (0 guard or lower) regardless of the length of hair on top. Achieve a clean, sharp look that seamlessly blends the sides and back.
Specializing in short styles. Book transformation cut if hair is long or over 10 weeks since last visit. Not for bald fades.
Personalized haircuts tailored for individuals aged 65 and older, ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable experience with priority on safety and ease of access.
Designed for clients looking to make a significant change from longer hair to a much shorter style. Extra time and expertise for a flawless transition.
For clients of all ages who prefer a haircut without clippers on the sides and back. Hair must be washed prior to service.
The full experience with a haircut and shampoo.
Uniform length throughout using the same clipper guard. Clean and low-maintenance style with no fading.
Beard trim and line up with electric beard trimmers. No hot towel or straight razor.
Beard trim and line up with hot towel service and straight razor shave.
Experience the art of grooming with hot towel treatment and rich lather for a smooth finish with classic straight razor shave.
Classic haircut combined with precise beard trim using beard trimmer machine. Clean and well-groomed look without hot towels or straight razors.
Standard haircut complemented by straight razor shave, warm lather and hot towel. Leaves you looking sharp and feeling refreshed.

column2: Hair Cut and Deluxe Beard Trim
column4: Haircut paired with deluxe beard trim including straight razor shave for clean finish on neck and cheeks. Includes hot towel and warm lather.
